name: Starfleet Commander done beautiful
description:
I changed a few of my minor annoyances with the general look of the site.
Check out the release notes for more info about what was changed
additional_info:
Changelog:

V1.2
- Now works on ALL universes

v1.1:
- Removed space at the bottom

v1:
- Made the resources box bigger so everything fits inside
- Removed all links to buying commanders under buildings
- Removed terraforming box
- Removed all build-with-credits-boxes
- Centered the merchant button
- New background for resources box to fit new size.
